traits.name: Hold Breath
entries: The sailback can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The sailback makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the sailback can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not {@condition grappled} by the sailback. 14 (2d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.
